name: Fluffy Flight (Fripop, lolfrad)
description:
Meet Fluffy, the bird that is too "chunky" to fly. Help him get places by poking his little balloon. Make sure he eats a lot of healthy oranges along the way.

Clicking on something in the shop will give you free fruits that can be used to buy balloon skins. Some skins also have special effects.

Note: There is a bug in map menu were the game sometimes freezes. To resolve it refresh the site. Progress will be saved.
